hero.name: quonaro
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Building fast, reliable web applications with <fastapi>FastAPI</fastapi>, <vue3>Vue 3</vue3>, and modern tech.
hero.aiDescription: Thoughtfully integrating AI to accelerate development.

services.title: What I Deliver
services.subtitle: Reliable solutions for startups and tech companies seeking dependable contract development

fullStack.title: Full-Stack Web Applications
fullStack.description: End-to-end development of scalable web applications using FastAPI, Vue 3, and PostgreSQL. Clean architecture, comprehensive testing, and production-ready deployment.

ai.title: AI-Augmented Development
ai.description: Leveraging AI tools for code generation, testing, and documentation while maintaining clean, maintainable codebases. Accelerated development without sacrificing quality.

legacy.title: Legacy System Modernization
legacy.description: Migrating legacy applications from jQuery and Django to modern FastAPI + Vue architectures. Incremental refactoring with minimal downtime.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Identifying and resolving bottlenecks with Rust-powered optimizations. Database query optimization, caching strategies, and system architecture improvements.

quote.text: "Senior engineer you'd trust with your core product"
quote.subtext: Professional, calm, confident — not salesy. Engineering depth over flashy demos.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Together
contact.subtitle: Need a reliable full-stack developer? Reach out via email or Telegram.
contact.emailDescription: Preferred for project discussions and detailed requirements
